snippet: A senior Chinese military official made the request in a meeting with Susan E. Rice, the national security adviser.
abstract: China tells Susan E Rice, Pres Obama's national security adviser, to halt its 'close-in' aerial and naval surveillance of the country on last day of Rice's visit; warning comes with Chinese-American relations at their coolest in years.
lead_paragraph: A senior Chinese military official made the request in a meeting with Susan E. Rice, the national security adviser.

headline.main: China Asks U.S. to End Close-Up Military Surveillance
headline.print_headline: China Asks U.S. to End Close-Up Military Surveillance

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
